q_en: What are the sewing tasks for Dress's product type?

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products of type "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, st.planned_number, st.completed_number, st.status FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE op.product_id IN (5, 13, 21, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks for the products identified in Step1

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the sewing tasks for dresses. Here are the details:

| 11      | 2024-03-21 00:00:00 | 2024-04-14 00:00:00 | 140            | 100              | In Progress|
| 12      | 2024-03-27 00:00:00 | 2024-04-12 00:00:00 | 150            | 120              | Completed  |
